description: MCTEMPLATE files are typically created by a user when he zips the world files into one .ZIP file then renames the extension from ".zip" to ".mctemplate". Since MCTEMPLATE files are saved in a ZIP format, they can be expanded using a Zip decompression utility.
MCTEMPLATE files are only supported by the Windows and Android versions of Minecraft. Minecraft on other platforms does not support MCTEMPLATE files. Instead, .MCPACK files are used.
